revised_title: Scientific Results of the Second Yarkand Mission
tldr: This article presents a list of books added to the Radcliffe Library, Oxford University Museum, during 1878. It also includes notes on the collection of coins and medals at the Pennsylvania Museum, Philadelphia, and scientific results from the Second Yarkand Mission, based on the collections and notes of Ferdinand Stoliczka. Additionally, instructions for observing the total solar eclipse of July 29, 1878, are provided, and an obituary for Woodcroft (Bennet), F.R.S., is reprinted from the Engineer.
